EmailTemplate.subject: Forbes Market Leaders - are you participating?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
You have an exclusive opportunity to appear in one of the most respected media brands in the nation -- Forbes magazine! In the December issue of Forbes magazine we will be highlighting a list of real estate market leaders across 35 metro areas. Each region will have a limited availability, so don't miss out!
There are many benefits to participating:
1) You receive national exposure. You are able to leverage your personal brand with one of the most-respected media and financial brands in the nation. Your friends, family and clients alike, throughout the entire country, will be able to see you in Forbes magazine!
2) A Forbes Headliner/Banner for your email, websites, marketing material and more! This will allow you to leverage the brand power and name recognition of Forbes year-round!
3) An Announcement Video social post. Share this social post to your Facebook or LinkedIn connections for expanded exposure of your Forbes magazine appearance.
4) 100 physical reprints and a cover wrapped magazine issue to use at listing presentations and open houses -- and of course with your current and past clients to gain referrals!
If you'd like to participate, call me as soon as possible to reserve your place!
Thank you,
{!User.User_Full_Name__c} {!User.Title} Five Star Professional {!User.Phone} {!User.Email} www.fivestarprofessional.com
